JobFullDesc: Description - External  Are you ready to enhance your skills and build your career in a rapidly evolving business climate? Are you looking for a career where professional development is embedded in its core culture? If so, Deloitte could be the place for you! Join our team of Government & Public Services Financial specialists who support large scale financial transformations by leveraging cutting edge technology and take your career to the next level!  Work you'll do  Design, develop, implement and support financial planning and reporting solutions using Oracle EPBCS as well as providing technical and functional guidance, assistance and support to client staff using this product and service  Provide technical solutions and support for Oracle Enterprise Planning and Budgeting Cloud Services (Oracle EPBCS) products and services  Perform unit, system and interface testing associated with the Oracle EPBCS product and corresponding system interface areas, as well as provide guidance and assistance to client staff to support these testing activities  Develop associated technical and functional Oracle EPCBS documentation including but not limited to requirements, design, code testing and end user documents, etc.  Attend and participate in requisite project and operational meetings and work sessions and provide timely updates on work performed to client peers, management and the client Oracle EPBCS customer community  The Team  Finance & Enterprise Performance  Our Finance & Enterprise Performance team works as a trusted advisor to CFOs, COOs, CIOs, and key executives. We advise, implement and deliver as-a-service solutions, helping our clients develop strategies and capabilities to support enterprise-wide decision-making, improve finance operations, and create impact within their organization.  Qualifications Required:  3+ years of experience as an application developer with strong skills and knowledge in Oracle Planning and Budgeting Cloud Services (PBCS) and Hyperion Enterprise Performance Management (EPM)  Bachelor's degree  Previous experience supporting minimum of 3 lifecycles of implementation of Oracle Planning and Budgeting Cloud Services or Hyperion Enterprise Performance Management.  Desired:  Specific emphasis on: High-volume integrations and data loads  Power shell scripting  EPM Automate - with error handling  Multiple managed PODS and releases  Webforms  Smart View Adhoc  Business rules and calculations  FR reporting (including hands-on experience with creating and maintaining HFR)  Essbase / Hyperion Planning  Experience Architecting, designing and implementing integrated Oracle PBCS solutions with outside enterprise services, data sources and associated security protocols  Previous experience performing business requirements gathering and analysis, with emphasis on Fit-gap  Previous experience authoring functional and technical specifications, developing test plans, conducting unit and integration testing, troubleshooting technical and user issues and interacting with business end users  Creating, managing and helping to resolve Oracle Service Requests (SRs)  Successful release schedule deployments  Communication (Excellent oral and written), customer service, teamwork and collaboration skills across all levels of staff  Excellent hands-on and analytical problem solving skills
